General.Name: Godrej Properties Limited
General.Description: Godrej Properties Limited, together with its subsidiaries, primarily engages in the real estate construction, development, and other related activities in India. The company develops residential, commercial, and township projects. Godrej Properties Limited was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.

7.Name: Mr. Anubhav  Gupta
7.Title: CEO of Vikhroli and Chief CSR & Sustainability Officer
